name: Engulfing
short_description: A powerful cBot using the engulfing pattern, one of the most used in the world. Optimizations highlight dimensions that work, just choose the best optimization.

params.title: Label (Magic Name)
params.content: When it opens a trade it marks it with this label

params.title: Stop Loss (pips)
params.content: The number of pips for the stoploss

params.title: Take Profit (pips)
params.content: The number of pips for the takeprofit

params.title: Money Target (zero disabled)
params.content: The amount above which it closes all open trades with this cbot

params.title: Slippage (pips)
params.content: The number of pips for slippage

params.title: Activation (pips)
params.content: The number of pips for the activation of breakeven

params.title: Distance (pips, move Stop Loss)
params.content: The number of pips that will be added to the breakeven point

params.title: Activation (pips)
params.content: The number of pips for the activation of trailing

params.title: Distance (pips, move Stop Loss)
params.content: The number of pips marking the distance between the current price and the stoploss

params.title: Fixed Lots
params.content: If greater than zero it will be used as fixed size, ignoring percentages

params.title: Capital
params.content: The capital with which to proportion the size as a percentage

params.title: % Risk
params.content: The proportion of the risk

params.title: Pips To Calculate ( if no stoploss, empty = '100' )
params.content: The number of pips by which the risk is calculated

params.title: Max Spread allowed
params.content: If the spread exceeds this value, the trigger is not confirmed and therefore the trade is not opened

params.title: Pause over this time
params.content: The time of the start of the pause

params.title: Pause under this time
params.content: The time of the end of the pause

params.title: Max GAP Allowed (pips)
params.content: If the gap between the last 2 candles exceeds this value, the trigger is not confirmed and therefore the trade is not opened

params.title: Max Number of Trades
params.content: The maximum number of trades to market simultaneously

params.title: Minimum Husband Body
params.content: The minimum number of pips for the body of the largest candle

params.title: Maximum Husband Body
params.content: The maximum number of pips for the body of the largest candle

params.title: Minimum Wife Body %
params.content: The proportion of the smaller candle to the larger candle

params.title: Maximum Wife Body %
params.content: The proportion of the smaller candle to the larger candle

params.title: EMA Fast Period
params.content: The period of the fastest EMA needed to identify the trend

params.title: EMA Slow Period
params.content: The period of the slower EMA needed to identify the trend

params.title: TOP Period
params.content: The number of candles used to identify whether a movement is bullish or bearish

params.title: Open Position On Start
params.content: Open position only for debugging

params.title: Color Text
params.content: The text color for notification on the chart
